26#include "archive_platform.h"
27__FBSDID("$FreeBSD$");
28
29#include "archive.h"
30#include "archive_private.h"
31
32#if ARCHIVE_VERSION_NUMBER < 4000000
33/* Deprecated; remove in libarchive 4.0 */
34int
35archive_read_support_compression_all(struct archive *a)
36{
37 return archive_read_support_filter_all(a);
38}
39#endif
40
41int
42archive_read_support_filter_all(struct archive *a)
43{
44 archive_check_magic(a, ARCHIVE_READ_MAGIC,
45 ARCHIVE_STATE_NEW, "archive_read_support_filter_all");
46
47 /* Bzip falls back to "bunzip2" command-line */
48 archive_read_support_filter_bzip2(a);
49 /* The decompress code doesn't use an outside library. */
50 archive_read_support_filter_compress(a);
51 /* Gzip decompress falls back to "gzip -d" command-line. */
52 archive_read_support_filter_gzip(a);
53 /* Lzip falls back to "unlzip" command-line program. */
54 archive_read_support_filter_lzip(a);
55 /* The LZMA file format has a very weak signature, so it
56 * may not be feasible to keep this here, but we'll try.
57 * This will come back out if there are problems. */
58 /* Lzma falls back to "unlzma" command-line program. */
59 archive_read_support_filter_lzma(a);
60 /* Xz falls back to "unxz" command-line program. */
61 archive_read_support_filter_xz(a);
62 /* The decode code doesn't use an outside library. */
63 archive_read_support_filter_uu(a);
64 /* The decode code doesn't use an outside library. */
65 archive_read_support_filter_rpm(a);
66 /* The decode code always uses "lrzip -q -d" command-line. */
67 archive_read_support_filter_lrzip(a);
68 /* Lzop decompress falls back to "lzop -d" command-line. */
69 archive_read_support_filter_lzop(a);
70 /* The decode code always uses "grzip -d" command-line. */
71 archive_read_support_filter_grzip(a);
72 /* Lz4 falls back to "lz4 -d" command-line program. */
73 archive_read_support_filter_lz4(a);
74
75 /* Note: We always return ARCHIVE_OK here, even if some of the
76 * above return ARCHIVE_WARN. The intent here is to enable
77 * "as much as possible." Clients who need specific
78 * compression should enable those individually so they can
79 * verify the level of support. */
80 /* Clear any warning messages set by the above functions. */
81 archive_clear_error(a);
82 return (ARCHIVE_OK);
83}
84
